name: Dacia
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, o glorious king! Under your leadership, the Dacian tribes have been united under a single kingdom! The kingdom of Dacia spanned what is today the countries of Moldova and Romania. In your conquests and reforms, you have made the Dacian tribes into a powerful force which even the Greeks and Romans saw as a powerful threat.
startIntroPart2: The kingdom of Dacia is at your command and is poised to be a power among the Greeks, Romans and Celts. Your people look to you to bring the kingdom to great heights! Will you accept the challenge? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your nation has no place here. I declare war.
attacked: War? You think you can stand us?
defeated: So... Dacia is gone. I hope we will be remembered.
introduction: Hello there. I am Burebista, king of Dacia, and I welcome you in my kingdom.
tradeRequest: Let's have a trade. What do you say?
uniques: +10% Strength for all units during Golden Age
